thread.title: Cosco Corp warns of loss in second quarter
thread.title_full: Cosco Corp warns of loss in second quarter

author: shippingherald.com
title: Cosco Corp warns of loss in second quarter
text:
Cosco Corporation (Singapore) has warned investors of an expected net loss for the second quarter ended 30 June 2015, as against a profit in the previous corresponding period.
Cosco Corp said the loss is mainly due to the low crude oil prices over recent months which has had an adverse impact on the global offshore marine industry.
The company also cited “the languid dry bulk shipping market which has brought great pressures to the company’s dry bulk fleet operations and the slump in the shipbuilding market which has negatively impacted the company’s shipyards.”
The company will release its second quarter results on 31 July 2015.
